mapper.sql: c_id, c_scope_id, c_name, c_formula, c_description, n_valid, d_time
mapper.insert:
insert into t_potentials_function
c_id,
c_scope_id,
c_name,
c_formula,
c_description,
n_valid,
d_time,
c_formula_html,
b_image,
#{cId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{cScopeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{cName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{cFormula,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{cDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{nValid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{dTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{cFormulaHtml,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
#{bImage,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY},
mapper.update:
update t_potentials_function
c_scope_id = #{cScopeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
c_name = #{cName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
c_formula = #{cFormula,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
c_description = #{cDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
n_valid = #{nValid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
d_time = #{dTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
c_formula_html = #{cFormulaHtml,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
b_image = #{bImage,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY},
where c_id = #{cId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_potentials_function set c_scope_id = #{cScopeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_name = #{cName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_formula = #{cFormula,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_description = #{cDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, n_valid = #{nValid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, d_time = #{dTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, c_formula_html = #{cFormulaHtml,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, b_image = #{bImage,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY} where c_id = #{cId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_potentials_function set c_scope_id = #{cScopeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_name = #{cName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_formula = #{cFormula,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_description = #{cDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, n_valid = #{nValid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, d_time = #{dTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where c_id = #{cId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select fun.* from t_potentials_function fun, t_comb_function combfun where fun.c_id = combfun.c_ptentials_function_id and combfun.c_element_comb_id = #{combId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select ,
from t_potentials_function where n_valid = 1 order by d_time desc
